          <title>
            <string language="en">Positions of Mars in the sky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Positionen von Mars im Himmel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Positions de Mars dans le ciel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Posições de Marte no céu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posizioni di Marte nel cielo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέσεις του Αρη στον ουρανό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Posiciones de Marte en el cielo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure shows the different positions of Mars in the sky over the course of the year.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mars</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt die unterschiedlichen 
Positionen von Mars im Himmel über dem Kurs des Jahres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure montre les différentes positions de 
Mars dans le ciel en année.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura mostra as posições diferentes de Marte 
no céu sobre o curso do ano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura mostra le posizioni differenti di Marte 
nel cielo durante l'anno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός εμφανίζει διαφορετικές θέσεις του Αρη στον 
ουρανό κατά τη διάρκεια του έτους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura muestra las diversas posiciones de Marte
en el cielo sobre el curso del año.</string>
